name: remo-fects
description: Remotion 特效视频生成器 - 多特效项目集合

scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:node && npm run clean:cache && npm run clean:chrome
scripts.clean:node: node -e "const fs=require('fs');['effects','api'].forEach(d=>{const p=process.cwd()+'/'+d;if(fs.existsSync(p)){fs.readdirSync(p).forEach(sub=>{const subPath=p+'/'+sub+'/node_modules';if(fs.existsSync(subPath)){fs.rmSync(subPath,{recursive:true,force:true})}})}})" && echo '已清理所有子项目的 node_modules'
scripts.test: echo '请运行各个子项目的测试'
